text: OK, so what is momentum play? Momentum order flow pattern is when the market seeks new value territory whilst in price discovery mode. So you'll have a certain range of the market, so you'll have this range where the market is oscillating between and whilst it's oscillating between, once it really escapes that range or escapes that zone as the market has been compressed into a tight range or a as it leaves that area, it's a new price discovery mode. So another typical name for momentum play is a breakout trading where the market trigger stops outside the congested area of the time frame being analyzed. It can be the weekly charts, the daily charts, it can be effectively the 60-minute chart, the five-minute chart. So you're really looking at that very small time frame, or you're looking at multiple time frame structures and you're trying to locate whether it be intraday or multi-time frame charts of how you want to execute that play. And we're gonna be looking at a whole bunch of different price ladder plays and optimizing the right strategies for those plays.
